TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PipeSecurity extends System.Security.AccessControl.NativeObjectSecurity

summary.span: 表示管道的访问控制和审核安全。

span.span: Represents the access control and audit security for a pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定的管道以及如何审核访问尝试的访问权限。The class specifies the access rights for a pipe and how access attempts are audited. 此类访问和审核权限表示为一组规则。This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules. 表示每个访问规则对象，而表示每个审核规则对象。Each access rule is represented by a object, while each audit rule is represented by a object. 类是抽象的基础的 Microsoft Windows 文件安全系统。The class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system. 在此系统中，每个管道都有自由访问控制列表 (DACL)，它控制对管道的访问和系统访问控制列表 (SACL)，指定要审核的访问控制尝试。In this system, each pipe has a discretionary access control list (DACL), which controls access to the pipe, and a system access control list (SACL), which specifies the access control attempts that are audited. 和类是抽象的访问控制项 (Ace) 构成的 Dacl 和 Sacl。The and classes are abstractions of the access control entries (ACEs) that comprise DACLs and SACLs. 类隐藏许多 Dacl 和 Sacl 的详细信息; 无需担心 ACE 排序或 null DACL。The class hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs; you do not have to worry about ACE ordering or null DACLS. 使用类来检索、 添加或更改表示 DACL 和 SACL 的管道的访问规则。Use the class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a pipe. 若要将新的或已更改的访问或审核规则到管道，请使用方法。To persist new or changed access or audit rules to a pipe, use the method. 若要从现有文件检索访问或审核规则，请使用 方法。To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个空不基于现有管道的对象。This constructor creates an empty object that is not based on an existing pipe. 然后可以使用访问控制信息填充该对象并将其应用于一个管道。You can then populate the object with access control information and apply it to a pipe. 可以添加访问权限或审核规则对象使用方法。You can add access or audit rules to the object using the method. 可以删除访问权限或审核规则使用方法。You can remove access or audit rules using the method. 若要将新的或已更改的访问或审核规则到管道，请使用方法。To persist new or changed access or audit rules to a pipe, use the method. 若要从现有文件检索访问或审核规则，请使用 方法。To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AccessRightType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ AccessRightType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与当前 对象关联的可保护对象的 。

span.span: Gets the of the securable object that is associated with the current object.

value.span: 与当前 对象关联的可保护对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the securable object that is associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类类重写属性，并返回它们用于表示访问权限的类型。Classes that derive from the class override the property and return the type they use to represent access rights. 数组或包含多个类型的安全对象的集合时，使用此属性来确定要使用每个安全对象的正确的枚举类型。When you work with arrays or collections that contain multiple types of security objects, use this property to determine the correct enumeration type to use with each security object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将新规则添加到规则列表的对象包含。如果已存在指定的规则的访问控制列表 (ACL)方法仍将添加的规则，有一个例外：对象，它使用创建值将取代创建的对象值。The method adds a new rule to the list of rules that a object contains.If an access control list (ACL) already exists for the specified rule, the method will still add the rule, with one exception: a object that is created using the value supersedes an object that is created using the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除所有匹配访问规则或所有匹配访问规则从当前对象。The method removes either all matching access rules or all matching access rules from the current object. 例如，可以使用此方法中删除所有表示通过访问用户的规则对象创建使用值，值和用户帐户。For example, you can use this method to remove all access rules for a user by passing a object created using the value, the value, and a user account. 方法中删除指定任何拒绝规则值或值。The method removes any deny rules that specify the value or the value.

span.span: The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetAccessRule(class System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRule rule) cil managed

param.name: rule
param.span: 要添加的访问规则。

span.span: The access rule to add.

summary.span: 将所有访问规则从与当前 对象关联的自定义访问控制列表 (DACL) 中移除，然后添加指定的访问规则。

span.span: Removes all access rules in the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) that is associated with the current object and then adds the specified access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 规则或覆盖匹配所有相同 ACL 规则`rule`参数。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`参数指定值和方法将查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值，则相同的规则将被覆盖。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值完全相同的规则也将被覆盖。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will also be overwritten.

span.span: The parameter is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的访问控制列表 (ACL) 规则或覆盖匹配所有相同 ACL 规则的值`rule`参数。The method adds the specified access control list (ACL) rule or overwrites any identical ACL rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`参数指定值和方法将查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值，则相同的规则将被覆盖。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法查找指定的相同 ACL 规则值完全相同的规则不会被覆盖。If the method finds an identical ACL rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 在与当前 对象关联的系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 中设置审核规则。

span.span: Sets an audit rule in the System Access Control List (SACL) that is associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加指定的审核规则或覆盖与匹配任何相同的审核规则的值`rule`参数。The method adds the specified audit rule or overwrites any identical audit rules that match the value of the `rule` parameter. 例如，如果`rule`参数指定值和方法将查找指定的相同的审核规则值，则相同的规则将被覆盖。For example, if the `rule` parameter specifies a value and the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will be overwritten. 如果方法查找指定的相同的审核规则值完全相同的规则不会被覆盖。If the method finds an identical audit rule that specifies the value, the identical rule will not be overwritten.

span.span: The parameter is .
